text: Beautiful Katamari, released in Japan as is a third-person puzzle-action video game made by Namco Bandai for the Xbox 360 game console. Wii and PlayStation 3 versions have been talked about by Namco Bandai, but no release date has been set. Category:2007 video games Category:Bandai Namco games Category:Puzzle video games Category:Xbox 360 games Category:Xbox 360-only games Category:Video games about vacationing Category:Video games developed in Japan
title: Beautiful Katamari
